channel.title: OWLcasts
channel.description:
An audio series for people interested in gaining a greater understanding of the many varied areas of the Qabalah and the Tree of Life, and how these can be used in every day life.

Helping you to understand yourself better and to use the Tree of Life as a tool for self development.
channel.itunes:author: Order of the White Lion/ISISworkshops
channel.itunes:keywords: Qabalah,Kabbalah,Order of the white lion, ISISworkshops, Lorraine Morgan, Astrology, Karma, Tarot, Practical Qabalah, Spiritual Path, Doorkeeper, Malkuth
channel.itunes:subtitle: An audio series for people interested in gaining a greater understanding of the many varied areas of the Qabalah and the Tree of Life, and how these can be used in every day life. Helping you to understand yourself better and to use the Tree of L
channel.itunes:summary: An audio series for people interested in gaining a greater understanding of the many varied areas of the Qabalah and the Tree of Life, and how these can be used in every day life. Helping you to understand yourself better and to use the Tree of Life as a tool for self development.

item.title: Malkuth - The Kingdom
item.description:
An introduction to the sephirah of Malkuth on the Tree of Life, its influences and how drawing on it's energies can help in our lives. This podcast includes a description of the Temple itself.

A downloadable workbook of Malkuth is now available for those

item.title: Introduction to Spirit Guides
item.description: This OWLcast introduces you to the notions of Spiritual Guides by touching on subjects such as re-incarnation, the Astral worlds and spiritual communication.
item.itunes:author: Order of the White Lion
item.itunes:subtitle: This OWLcast introduces you to the notions of Spiritual Guides by touching on subjects such as re-incarnation, the Astral worlds and spiritual communication.
item.itunes:summary: This OWLcast introduces you to the notions of Spiritual Guides by touching on subjects such as re-incarnation, the Astral worlds and spiritual communication.

item.title: Introduction to Astrology
item.description: An introduction to Astrology. How do the Planets, Moon and the Stars effect us and our lives?
item.itunes:author: Order of the White Lion
item.itunes:subtitle: An introduction to Astrology. How do the Planets, Moon and the Stars effect us and our lives?
item.itunes:summary: An introduction to Astrology. How do the Planets, Moon and the Stars effect us and our lives?

item.title: Fate & Destiny
item.description: An introduction to the Fate & Destiny, Do you know the difference between the two?
item.itunes:author: Order of the White Lion
item.itunes:subtitle: An introduction to the Fate & Destiny, Do you know the difference between the two?
item.itunes:summary: An introduction to the Fate & Destiny, Do you know the difference between the two?

item.title: Karma
item.description: An introduction to the principles of Karma. Do you know the difference between good and bad karma and how they are accumulated?
item.itunes:subtitle: An introduction to the principles of Karma. Do you know the difference between good and bad karma and how they are accumulated?
item.itunes:summary: An introduction to the principles of Karma. Do you know the difference between good and bad karma and how they are accumulated?

item.title: Introduction
item.description: An introduction to the principles behind Practical Qabalah, and a taster of what you can expect from this podcast.
item.itunes:author: Order of the White Lion
item.itunes:subtitle: An introduction to the principles behind Practical Qabalah, and a taster of what you can expect from this podcast.
